RelatedSentence: South Korea 's President Park Geun-hye has announced plans to break up the country 's coastguard following last month 's ferry disaster .
South Korea 's President Park Geun-hye has announced plans to break up the country 's coastguard following last month 's ferry disaster .
In a televised address , Ms Park formally apologised for the sinking and said that a new safety agency would now handle any rescue duties .
